pull.title: Fix shutdown hang with >= 8 -addnodes set
pull.body:
We previously would block waiting for a CSemaphoreGrant, when we
did not need to.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message:
Fix shutdown hang with >= 8 -addnodes set

We previously would block waiting for a CSemaphoreGrant in
ThreadOpenAddedConnections, when we did not need to. This would
block as the posts in CConnman shutdown were both to the wrong
semaphore and in the wrong location.

events.body: Changed the fix to post to semAddnode instead of TryAcquire.

events.message: Add missing braces in semaphore posts in net
